properties.Problem to be addressed/Recommendation: No protective fence. No action is needed because users can attend.�
No protective wall and pavement slab. Recommend to construct 150mm thick x 6m long x2.5m high concrete wall and 6mx1m pavement.�
Not serviceable. Recommend to rehabilitate through nominated agents

properties.Scheme: Oluwawatta Pradeshiya Sabha water supply scheme�
properties.Problem to be addressed/Recommendation: Storage tanks over 150 Cu.m are directly fed by pumping from the Haragama stream. It is recommended to construct a slow sand filter under the direction of NWS&DB, giving high priority.�

Surface runoff during rains flowing into the well. Recommended to construct 500mm x500mmx7m long peripheral concrete beam on dress masonry wall and a 1:3 cement sand mortar plastering finish smooth with neat cement float to the exterior surface.�
Seepage through the wall retaining the embankment. Recommend removing existing blocks and Constructing a 300mm thick X 2000mm high x 3000mm long concrete wall to retain the embankment.�
Leaking of stream water in to the well. Recommend constructing 150mm thick concrete curtain wall of 2500mm x 3500 long with 10-12mm Diameter anchor bolts at close intervals for proper bonding.�
Leaking of stream water into the well. Recommend constructing 150mm thick concrete wall of 2000mm x 3500 long.�

Unserviceable. Recommended to Replace all serviceable parts such as Plunger, Check Valves, Riser Pipe, Seals and O rings, Foot Valve, connecting rod, Pump handle and bearings etc. through agents or competent suppliers recommended by WS&DB�
